long_description: Light and tough, our Novara Ponderosa(R) 24 in. mountain bike is built for budding trail riders and features a light frame and a responsive, kid-specific suspension fork to soak up rough terrain. Resilient aluminum frame is lightweight and durable, making it easy for kids to manage. Spinner Grind 1 AL suspension fork soaks up bumps and helps kids maintain control; lighter spring is tuned especially for kids' use. Smooth-shifting SRAM 21-speed drivetrain gives kids lots of gear choices to tackle changing terrain and gradients; shifting gears is as easy as a simple flick of the wrist. Powerful, trustworthy Tektro linear-pull brakes are easy to use. Versatile tread on the Kenda tires rolls smoothly on the pavement and delivers confident traction offroad. Specs on our Novara Ponderosa 24 in. bike are subject to change.
